exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q, r : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H0 : canonical A0 eqA ltM q H1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM r Unable to unify "eqP ?M1860 ?M1863 ?M1871 (pluspf ?M1861 ?M1864 ?M1870 ?M1873 ?M1875 ?M1876) (pluspf ?M1861 ?M1864 ?M1870 ?M1873 ?M1877 ?M1878)" with "eqP A eqA n (multpf p (multpf q r)) (multpf (multpf p q) r)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q, r : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H0 : canonical A0 eqA ltM q H1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM r Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (multpf ?M2062 (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec ?M2063 ?M2064)) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (multpf ?M2062 ?M2063) (multpf ?M2062 ?M2064))" with "eqP A eqA n p (multpf p q)".

original: intros. apply eqp_pluspf_com; auto. apply multpf_comp; auto. apply multpf_dist_plusl; auto.
